summary:
This mod adds Robur, a brazen Wood-Elf archer to Skyrim. You can find him in a small makeshift campsite outside of Riverwood
(look for the fallen tree).
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Robur Follower

[/size][/color][/font][size=4][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff]This mod introduces Robur, a brazen Wood-Elf hunter to Skyrim. He can be found hanging out at his makeshift campsite just outside the Riverwood Gates (look for the fallen over tree).

[/color][/font][/size][i][size=4]*Ran through Tes5Edit and playtested! [/size][/i][size=4][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff]


[/color][/font][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff]Please refer to the 'instructions' readme and the required mods section to find out what you will need for this mod to work. 
[/color][/font][/size]
[font=Tahoma][color=#ffff00][size=3]
[/size][/color][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Features:[/size][/color][/font]

[list]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Marriageable [/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Lightfoot (will not set off traps)[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Essential (cannot be killed)[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4]Master archer[/size][/font]
[/list]
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Mods I'm using [/size][/color][/font]

[font=Times New Roman][size=4]The following mods are used in these screenshots, however are not included in the mod itself (besides one sword & and one outfit from the Witcher mods), and come highly recommended. 

[/size][/font][list]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457]Facelight[/url]﻿ by Tktk1[/size][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2488/]Better males & younger faces[/url]﻿ by Chris57 [/size][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24273]Ethereal Elven Overhaul[/url]﻿ by Nuska[/size][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?]Amazing Follower Tweaks[/url]﻿ by Dheuster[/size][/font]
[/list]
author: AedanStarfang
